text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Abidjan | official_name = Autonomous District of Abidjan | other_name = | native_name = | nickname = | settlement_type = City and autonomous district | motto = "District d'Abidjan, acteur de développement" | image_skyline = Plateau 2010, Abidjan.jpg | imagesize = 300px | image_caption = Abidjan skyline | image_flag = Flag of Abidjan.png | flag_size = | image_seal = AbidjanLogo.png | sealsize = | shield_size = | image_map = | mapsize = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = Côte d'Ivoire | pushpin_label_position = bottom | pushpin_mapsize = 300 | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Cote d'Ivoire | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = District | subdivision_name1 = Abidjan | subdivision_type2 = Department | subdivision_name2 = Abidjan | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | government_footnotes = | government_type = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Robert Beugré Mambé | leader_title1 = | leader_name1 = | established_title = | established_date = | area_magnitude = | unit_pref = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 2119 | area_land_km2 = | area_urban_km2 = 422 | population_as_of = 2014 census | population_footnotes = | population_note = | population_total = 4,707,404 (district); 4,395,243 (city) | population_density_km2 = auto | population_density_sq_mi = | population_metro = | population_density_metro_km2 = auto | population_density_metro_sq_mi = | population_blank1_title = Ethnicities | population_blank1 = | population_density_blank1_km2 = | population_density_blank1_sq_mi= | population_demonym = Abidjanais | timezone = GMT | utc_offset = +0 | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | coordinates = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 18 | elevation_ft = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code = +225 | blank_name = | blank_info = | blank1_name = | blank1_info = | website = | footnotes = }} Abidjan is the largest city and former capital of Ivory Coast. It is the commercial and banking center of Ivory Coast as well as the de facto capital. Yamoussoukro is the official capital. The city is in Ébrié Lagoon. It is built on many peninsulas and islands which are connected by bridges. There are an estimated 4 to 5 million people living in the metropolitan area. == History == The city grew after the construction of a new wharf in 1931. It was made the capital of the French colony in 1933. In 1983, Yamoussoukro was made the capital of the country, but most government offices and foreign embassies are still in Abidjan. ==References== == Other websites == * Photos from Abidjan * Map of Abidjan Category:Capital cities in Africa Category:Cities in Ivory Coast Category:1931 establishments Category:1930s establishments in Africa
title: Abidjan
